thread.title: What's cooking with the Arizona Coyotes
thread.title_full: What's cooking with the Arizona Coyotes

title: What's cooking with the Arizona Coyotes
text:
What's cooking with the Arizona Coyotes There is no shortage of delicious eats at Coyotes home games. Post to Facebook What's cooking with the Arizona Coyotes There is no shortage of delicious eats at Coyotes home games.   12news.com: http://12ne.ws/1LyyRNn   Join the Conversation To   What's cooking with the Arizona Coyotes Robby Baker , 12 Sports 2:38 p.m. MST October 16, 2015 Robby Baker shows some of the best, new food options at Arizona Coyotes games. KPNX There is no shortage of delicious eats at Coyotes home games. There are plenty of great food choices at Coyotes home games. (Photo: 12 Sports) 1 CONNECT 5 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Arizona Coyotes have been one of the most exciting teams to start the NHL season, but there is just as much excitement happening off the ice as on it. 
Gila River Arena boasts tons of new food options this season, and if you're like me, you'll be in heaven. 
They have everything a foodie could want, from Smoke's Poutinerie to smoked brisket sandwiches. 
If you're wondering what poutine is, it's french fries covered in gravy and cheese curds. If that's not enough to fill your belly, go ahead and top it with a bacon cheeseburger or chipotle pulled pork! 
There are also new places for fans to hang out before and after games, like the Wicked Tango Terrace on the suite level. 
If you have a sweet tooth, look no further than the deep fried cookie dough pucks. 
You read that right, deep fried cookie dough with raspberry dipping sauce. 
It's out of this world. 
Check out the video above for a preview of all the best new food options at the arena! Robby Baker showcases the new fan experiences at Gila River Arena. KPNX 1 CONNECT 5 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://12ne.ws/1LyyRNn TOP VIDEOS
